People are wrong to call this shit realistic because of the ending. LOL. Let's see, the premise is not bad. It is possible that there is a discreet relationship between mother and stranger. But Laliberte is a sensationalist as always, so he writes the shitty story that "the mother has sex with the Fuckboy and no longer even cares to see her son" XDDDDD. The funny thing is the contradiction there is: from a maternal mother who even picks up a guy for charity, to a bitch who doesn't care if her son ran away from home. That contradiction makes me laugh out loud and is nothing more than the typical villainizing that NTR characters. I know that Laliberte wants readers to feel helpless when seeing such an outburst, but it is so absurd that it seems comical to me

This is so fucking sad and real... I know about  a fucked up story like this. A friend of my mother, psychologist, divorced her husband, but keep his daughter. Found a scumbag, with dreams about being singer, brought him to her home and present him to her daughter. The daughter scaped her home and went to her aunt, it was difficult to her to get at a university. The "psychologist" (my mother's friend) moved to a bigger house, knowing that it would be impossible to pay the rent continually with her salary (obviously, the scumbag doesn't work). All went from shit to bullshit pretty quickly. It's ironic because know the "psychologist" needs a psychologist.
